definitions.definition: Having affection or warm regard ; loving ; fond .
examples: She eulogised her always warm and affectionate brother.

definitions.definition: Characterised by or proceeding from affection; indicating love ; tender .
examples: the affectionate care of a parent; an affectionate countenance; an affectionate message; affectionate language

definitions.definition: Eager ; passionate ; strongly inclined toward something.

main_definition: ( of a person ) Having affection or warm regard ; loving ; fond .
secondary_definitions: ( of an action, etc. ) Characterised by or proceeding from affection; indicating love ; tender .
( obsolete ) Eager ; passionate ; strongly inclined toward something.
